channel.title: How to build a Successful Information Security Career
channel.description:
Hi 0x00ers,
While surfing the web, I stumbled upon a blog post which I found to be very helpful for beginners. Be sure to check out this guide if you want to start a successful cybersec career! :slight_smile: https://danielmiessler.com/blog/build-successful-infosec-career/
Best Regards, SmartOne

item.title: How to build a Successful Information Security Career

item.description:

item.title: How to build a Successful Information Security Career
item.dc:creator: Mantis
item.description:
One thing to add to this which isn’t often covered by articles or “how-to” stuff is “Know your gaps”. By this I mean it’s super important to understand that you don’t know everything. There will be gaps in your knowledge and you should be confident in identifying these. This will help you grow as a tester and consultant.

Read full topic

item.title: How to build a Successful Information Security Career
item.dc:creator: zuhrl
item.description:
Hi thanks for your writeup it was super helpful. I have a question about setting up a home lab. Currently I am using my desktop PC (around 8gb of RAM) as a daily driver and also use it for practicing pen testing with some VMs on virtaulbox. Though this gets pretty stressed with just 2 VMs running.

I’d love to setup the kind of lab you are suggesting and am wondering if i can achieve this with some relatively cheap hardware as i’m on a pretty tight budget while im studying. Thanks

Read full topic

Hi 0x00ers,

While surfing the web, I stumbled upon a blog post which I found to be very helpful for beginners.
Be sure to check out this guide if you want to start a successful cybersec career!

Daniel Miessler – 30 Sep 08

How to Build a Cybersecurity Career [2019 Update] | Daniel Miessler

A comprehensive guide to building a career in cybersecurity—from building your lab, education, certs, speaking, networking, presence, brand…

Best Regards,
SmartOne
